page.title: 17PEVERELL METHODIST CHURCH
page.content: Denomination : Methodist Person in charge is Minister There have been 24 Ministers. The church can hold 400 people. {HISTORY}Work a Peverell began as a result of Mission band preaching. Later that year (1893) a mission room was bought from grandfather of Michael Foot.Ground bought for a mission house cost Â£640.1896 the Iron chaple opened. 1901 1st minister. Present church cost Â£3990 and was opened 17th May 1905.For the next 20 years various groups used the premises (scouts,guides).1927 saw an increase in seating of 150 & the internal structure changed.1934 New Methodist Hymn Book introduced.1937 debt of new church building cleared. 1946 Golden Jubilee as a church celebrated.1970 Iron building demolished.1972 back of church transformed.
